conversation1.name: Jim
conversation1.dialogue: We have been working together for 12 years, weird joke Dwight

conversation1.name: Dwight
conversation1.dialogue: You're not Jim, Jim is not Asian

conversation1.name: Jim
conversation1.dialogue: You seriously never noticed? Hey. Hats off to you for not seeing race

conversation1.name: Dwight
conversation1.dialogue: All right then Jim, Why don't you tell me about that sale you made yesterday?

conversation1.name: Jim
conversation1.dialogue: Wellington Systems? Sold them 10 cases of 24-pound letter stock. Or were you talking about Krieger-Murphy?

conversation1.name: Jim
conversation1.dialogue: Because I didn't close that one yet but I'm hoping I've got a voicemail from Paul Krieger waiting for me

conversation1.name: Dwight
conversation1.dialogue: Okay then, put in the password then

conversation1.name: Dwight
conversation1.dialogue: How did you know? No no no no. That is sensitive information for employees only, not for outsiders

conversation1.name: Jim
conversation1.dialogue: Dwight cut it out I'm trying to work here

conversation1.name: Dwight
conversation1.dialogue: You don't work here! You're not Jim!

conversation1.name: Dwight
conversation1.dialogue: I don't know who you are, but you are not Jim, this is Jim! Oh my-
